- the Versatile Commodore Emulator

About News User Manual Download Support BUGS TODO Resources Developers Copyright

Download VICE for Android systems

We do not provide official binaries for Android anymore. There are several different unofficial ports on the Android store - you might want to look at these. If you want to help improving the official Android port and/or want to provide binaries, please get in touch with us. Occasionally we might upload unofficial test builds here.

Old (VICE 3.0) binary distributions

    armeabi binary distributions

  • x64 binary for armeabi Android systems: AnVICE_x64-(armeabi)-3.0.apk.
  • x64sc binary for armeabi Android systems: AnVICE_x64sc-(armeabi)-3.0.apk.
  • x64dtv binary for armeabi Android systems: AnVICE_x64dtv-(armeabi)-3.0.apk.
  • xscpu64 binary for armeabi Android systems: AnVICE_xscpu64-(armeabi)-3.0.apk.
  • x128 binary for armeabi Android systems: AnVICE_x128-(armeabi)-3.0.apk.
  • xplus4 binary for armeabi Android systems: AnVICE_xplus4-(armeabi)-3.0.apk.
  • xvic binary for armeabi Android systems: AnVICE_xvic-(armeabi)-3.0.apk.

    • armeabi-v7a binary distributions

  • x64 binary for armeabi-v7a Android systems: AnVICE_x64-(armeabi-v7a)-3.0.apk.
  • x64sc binary for armeabi-v7a Android systems: AnVICE_x64sc-(armeabi-v7a)-3.0.apk.
  • x64dtv binary for armeabi-v7a Android systems: AnVICE_x64dtv-(armeabi-v7a)-3.0.apk.
  • xscpu64 binary for armeabi-v7a Android systems: AnVICE_xscpu64-(armeabi-v7a)-3.0.apk.
  • x128 binary for armeabi-v7a Android systems: AnVICE_x128-(armeabi-v7a)-3.0.apk.
  • xplus4 binary for armeabi-v7a Android systems: AnVICE_xplus4-(armeabi-v7a)-3.0.apk.
  • xvic binary for armeabi-v7a Android systems: AnVICE_xvic-(armeabi-v7a)-3.0.apk.

    • arm64-v8a binary distributions

  • x64 binary for arm64-v8a Android systems: AnVICE_x64-(arm64-v8a)-3.0.apk.
  • x64sc binary for arm64-v8a Android systems: AnVICE_x64sc-(arm64-v8a)-3.0.apk.

Older binary distributions

Binaries of even older releases can be found on http://www.zimmers.net/anonftp/pub/cbm/crossplatform/emulators/VICE.

For more information visit the main page.
